description:
The cell_type option is defined in nova.conf as “api” or “compute”.
However, when creating a cell using “nova-manage” the cell type “parent” or “child” is expected.
nova-manage cell_type should be consistent with what is allowed in nova.conf.
title: Cell type in “nova-manage cell create” is different from what is used in nova.conf

comments.content:
The cell_type option is defined in nova.conf as “api” or “compute”.
However, when creating a cell using “nova-manage” the cell type “parent” or “child” is expected.
nova-manage cell_type should be consistent with what is allowed in nova.conf.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~moreira-belmiro-email-lists

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/149896
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: I'm not sure I would actually consider this a bug.  Allowing api/compute is a fine change, but I think parent/child is better terminology in this context.  I would actually rather that api/compute be renamed but that's a harder change to make.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alaski

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/149896
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=99a0b27ab5620424866b5a89d852fbe6248d43d3
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 99a0b27ab5620424866b5a89d852fbe6248d43d3
Author: Belmiro Moreira <email address hidden>
Date:   Sun Jan 25 20:48:24 2015 +0100

    Change cell_type values in nova-manage
    
    The option “cell_type” in nova.conf was introduced with the
    deprecation of “compute_api_class” option. It specifies the
    cell type as “api” or “compute”. However, when creating a cell
    using “nova-manage” the cell type “parent” or “child” is expected.
    
    This patch changes “nova-manage” to accept the cell type “api” and
    “compute”. Cell type “parent” and “child” are still accepted.
    
    DocImpact
    Closes-Bug: #1414480
    
    Change-Id: Icc0cba4f4d56911a65d586cbc0cfdb904ecc15ba
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
